title: Dr.  Harmenn's Angel Experiment Diary

**Director:** Dr. Harmenn ( ████ ████████ )

**Security Clearance:** Level 5

**Experiment Name:** Catch The Angel




Hello Dr.██████. This  experiment address is a record of my experiments on angelic experience. Please be patient for these experiments. Do not share this information with anyone for the confidentiality of the experiment.

||~ Diary #1 || || 12.04.2011 || 

[[div class="blockquote"]]
Hello, my name is Dr Harmenn F. My team and I were gathering information for our research in the mountains of ██████ when we came across a bright creature with many wings. It was so bright that I was almost blinded. Although my team did not see it, I am sure that I saw it and I will report it to my superiors. If I capture the being, I will definitely get permission to experiment on it.[[/div]]
ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ
ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ

||~ Diary #2 || || 16.04.2011 || 

[[div class="blockquote"]]
Interview Log

Officer of Record: Dr A. Innac
Subject: Dr Harmenn F.

-----------

<Excerpt begins.>

**Dr Harmenn:** I swear it's real, I saw it.

**Dr Innac:** You don't understand. I believe you, but you must provide proof before I can allow it.

**Dr Harmenn:** What proof can I give you? I only saw him for a few seconds and then when I went to call my team to my side, it was gone.

**Dr Innac:** We know your team didn't see him either. Are you really sure there's nothing mentally wrong wi-

**Dr Harmenn:** No, no, you're the only one who can make me think I'm not mentally ill, so let's drop the mental health bullshit.

**Dr Innac:** But you've been working on this subject here for nearly 12 years. In 12 years, couldn't your brain have done something like this to relax you?

**Dr Harmenn:** Absolutely not. I trust my brain very much, I'm sure I've seen it, I'll even take mental tests if necessary.

Dr Innac: Ok, then I will give you a team and you are allowed to work with this team for 7 months. But before that, you will take a mental health test.

**Dr Harmenn:** Thank you. But how can I find in 7 months what I've barely found in 12 years?

**Dr Innac:** That's none of my business, do your mental tests first. If there are no problems, I can extend the period to 12 months.

**Dr Harmenn:** Thank you very much. Have a good day.
[[/div]]
ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ
ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ

||~ Diary #3 || || 18.04.2011 || 

[[div class="blockquote"]]
My Mental Health report came back positive. I sent an email to Dr Innac.
[[div class="blockquote"]]
Hi, Dr Innac. My mental health report came back positive. I've attached the file to you. I thought maybe we could make the 7-month period 12 months like we agreed. Please get back to me if you agree.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ
ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ

||~ Diary #4 || || 18.04.2011 || 

[[div class="blockquote"]]
I received a call from Dr Innec on the same day. He accepted the team for 12 months. According to what he said, the team will be ready for about 1 month, I look forward to it. I have been working on this subject for 12 years and now I am in the position where I am closest to the result until now.

[[/div]]
ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ
ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ

||~ Diary #5 || || 7.06.2011 || 
[[div class="blockquote"]]
It took longer than we expected to organise the team. Obviously, no one wants to be part of a 12-year experiment. My team and I will set off on 09.06.2011. If nothing goes wrong, we will be there on 13.06.2011.
[[/div]]
ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ
ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ

||~ Diary #6 || || 12.06.2011 || 
[[div class="blockquote"]]
Fuck this shit. There's a big avalanche on the road and we have to go the rest of the way on foot. Normally we would melt the remnants of the avalanche and continue on our way, but the remnants of the avalanche are almost as big as the avalanche.
[[/div]]
ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ
ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ
||~ Diary #7 || || 15.06.2011 || 
[[div class="blockquote"]]
We've reached the mountains of ██████. We're trying to set up the necessary equipment. There is a great excitement in me. I hope we can prove the angel's existence without any problems. If I can prove the existence of the angel, we can catch it with a long-term team.
[[/div]]
ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ
ㅤㅤㅤㅤ
||~ Diary #8 || || 21.06.2011 || 
[[div class="blockquote"]]
██████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████.
[[/div]]
ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ
ㅤㅤㅤㅤ
||~ Diary #9 || || 21.06.2011 || 
[[div class="blockquote"]]
I thought I was rambling too much on page 8, so I scribbled over them a bit. I hope I won't have any problems when I transfer it to digital. Anyway, our team detected a signal in a very short time. We will try certain communication systems towards the location of the signal. Radio waves, for example. English texts. Morse code. Rays, etc. Hopefully we'll get some feedback.
[[/div]]

ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ
ㅤㅤㅤㅤ
||~ Diary #10 || || 12.07.2011 || 
[[div class="blockquote"]]
As a result of our long-term efforts, we managed to get a return. However, this was not the kind of thing we wanted. More precisely, it was not a return, but a death threat. But in a way, he seemed to want us to come there. We got it back through rays, Morse code and radio waves. Anyway, I'll leave the return here:
[[div class="blockquote"]]
If I see you in the Holy Land behind the mountains, by the shiny stones in the cave where the holy soldiers are in the minority, I will kill you. ~Possible Angel
[[/div]]
[[/div]]


ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ
ㅤㅤㅤㅤ
||~ Diary #11 || || 13.07.2011 || 
[[div class="blockquote"]]
Since there was no ‘Holy Land’ nearby, we chose the holy land behind the mountains, which was the closest to this place. We are on the road now and I will renew the digital diary when I reach the cave.
[[/div]]

||~ Diary #13 || || 17.07.2011 || 
[[div class="blockquote"]]
We managed to come to the |--Holy Land--| Cave. It is really strange here. According to the region and the season it is located, it should be covered with snow and even storms should break out, but it is no different from a desert. Up to 12,3 km away from the cave everything is covered with snow but after that it is just a desert. We didn't go inside the cave, but you can't see the inside in the slightest. While we set up our necessary equipment here, 2 people from our reconnaissance unit will go inside. I hope they come back safe and sound.
[[/div]]
author: rosewr
